title: The Olsen Gang on the Track
overview: Egon and his two cronies managed to sneak a fortune with them to Spain. Here they live a life in a whirl of pleasures, but they are not truly happy. While Egon always has the money chained to him, BÃ¸ffen still manages to steal them. Egon ends up in jail once again, and when he comes out, he has a brilliant plan.
